name: Fortune (Jeremy K)
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours

HOW TO PLAY:

Roll the dice at the bottom of the screen using Space or Enter. Use WASD to move, attack enemies, and open doors. Escape the dungeon!

CREDITS:

Art, Programming, and Game Design by Me

Music is "8 Bit Hideout!" by HeatleyBros.

TOOLS USED:

GameMaker Studio 2

Photoshop

Lospec

Audacity

Kenney.nl

freesound.org

This project is a demo build. If you discover any bugs or glitches, let me know!
